NK001(ka)037:0: snga 'gyur sdom rgyun mkhan brgyud kyi rnam thar nyung
NK001(ka)037:1: gsal sgron me'i kha skong nges shes 'dren pa'i pho
NK001(ka)037:2: nya zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)037:4: rnam 'dren stong rtsa'i dbus na pad dkar ltar //
NK001(ka)037:5: ngo mtshar thugs bskyed phrin las ches 'phags pa //
NK001(ka)037:6: rtsod ldan 'gro ba'i skyabs gcig zas gtsang sras //
NK001(ka)037:7: khyod zhabs yan lag dang po'i rgyan du mcho. //
NK001(ka)037:8: gangs ljongs mun gling mchod yon thugs bskyed gzi //
NK001(ka)037:9: nyi zla'i snang bas mdzes las thub pa'i bstan //
NK001(ka)037:10: ngur smrig rgyal mtshan thog mar sgreng mdzad mgon //
NK001(ka)037:11: mkhan chen zhi 'tsho'i bka' drin bsam gyin dad //
NK001(ka)037:12: rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin sdom brtson dam pa'i phul //
NK001(ka)037:13: lnga rig smra ba'i dbang po d+harma sh+r+ai //
NK001(ka)037:14: rim byon mkhan rabs gser ri'i phreng ba la //
NK001(ka)037:15: kun nas mos blos bstod phyag lan brgyar 'bul //
NK001(ka)037:16: 'di na bstan rtsa so thar 'dul ba'i khrims //
NK001(ka)037:17: thams cad yod smra'i lugs bzang gser 'gyur rtsis //
NK001(ka)037:18: rnam mang mos ldan lcags khams rin chen du //
NK001(ka)037:19: bsgrubs pa'i lo rgyus kha skong mdo tsam gleng //
NK001(ka)037:20: .'ang gangs can bod kyi ljongs su mnga' bdag chos
NK001(ka)037:21: rgyal khri srong lde'u btsan gyi rgya gar 'phags pa'i
NK001(ka)037:22: yul nas mkhan slob pan grub mang po spyan drangs
NK001(ka)037:23: te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gzhir bzhengs su btsugs
NK001(ka)037:25: mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i zhal snga nas sad mi
NK001(ka)037:26: mi bdun la sogs pa rab tu byung bar mdzad
NK001(ka)037:27: pa nas bzung bstan rtsa 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i sde
NK001(ka)037:28: chen po byung / bar skabs rgyal po glang dar
NK001(ka)037:29: mas bstan pa bsnub par phyogs pa na smar g.yo
NK001(ka)037:30: gtsang gsum gyis 'dul ba'i phyag dpe bsnams nas khams
NK001(ka)037:32: \nga dar bkrong rjes bla chen dang dbus gtsang gi
NK001(ka)037:33: mi bcus sdom rgyun blangs nas slar dbus gtsang du
NK001(ka)037:34: 'dul bstan nyams pa gsos shing rim par 'phel rgyas
NK001(ka)037:35: byung pa la smad 'dul du grags te don la
NK001(ka)037:36: dpal ldan zhi 'tsho'i sdom rgyun 'di la zer /
NK001(ka)037:37: . ltar smad 'dul sdom rgyun dbus gtsang stod smad dang /
NK001(ka)037:39: ga pa dam pa bde gshegs sogs kyis spel ba
NK001(ka)037:40: nas mdo khams phyogs su ma nyams par gnas bzhin
NK001(ka)037:41: pa'i thog / phyis rig 'dzin gter bdag gling pas
NK001(ka)037:42: g.yo ru grwa phyir snga 'gyur gyi chos sde o
NK001(ka)037:43: rgyan smin grol gling gsar du phyag btab zin rjes
NK001(ka)037:44: sku'i gcung lo chen d+harma sh+r+ai nyid sngar dgung grangs
NK001(ka)037:45: nyi shu par 7gong sa kun mkhyen lnga pa chen
NK001(ka)037:46: po las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs zin
NK001(ka)037:47: pa'i thog / na'ng / phyis rgyal mchog lnga pa
NK001(ka)037:48: chen po rang gi lung las snga 'gyur gyi bstan
NK001(ka)037:49: pa'i 'brel dang bcas smad 'dul ba'i sdom rgyun 'dzin
NK001(ka)037:51: de'i sdom rgyun kha rag zhal snga nas la bzhugs
NK001(ka)037:52: shing khong 'dul ba'i ngang tshugs kyang shin tu bzang
NK001(ka)037:53: bas der bskyar bsgrub gyis zhes bkas bskul ba ltar
NK001(ka)037:54: lo chen dgung lo nyer bdun par slar yang mkhan
NK001(ka)037:55: chen dkon mchog bstan 'dzin las dad pa'i dge 'dun
NK001(ka)037:56: grangs tshang ba'i dbus su tshig gsum bar ma chad
NK001(ka)037:57: pa'i cho gas bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
NK001(ka)037:58: dngos por bsgrubs / gung thang pan chen la sogs
NK001(ka)037:59: pa bshes gnyen gzhan du ma las 'dul ba'i bshad
NK001(ka)037:60: rgyun dang brda chad phyag len sogs mkhas par gsan
NK001(ka)037:61: dngos por bsgrubs / / phyis o rgyan smin grol
NK001(ka)037:62: gling gi gtsang grwa gsar btsug gi mkhan po'i khrir
NK001(ka)037:63: phebs te gzhi gsum gyi phyag len rnam par gtsang
NK001(ka)037:64: bas chos sde chen po bskyangs shing /
NK001(ka)037:66: gzhi gsum gyi cho ga sogs so thar 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)037:67: phyogs su gal che ba'i yig cha'ng mang du mdzad
NK001(ka)037:68: pa bcas kyi dam chos 'dul ba'i bstan rgyun la
NK001(ka)037:69: ches bka' drin gyi phul du gyur /
NK001(ka)037:70: gzhan thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i lo
NK001(ka)037:71: rgyus rnam thar zhib tu ni rje- nyid kyi mdzad
NK001(ka)037:72: rnam zhal gsungs ma ltar dang /
NK001(ka)037:73: 'dir dmigs gsal du barjoda bya lo chen rang nyid
NK001(ka)037:74: la thug gi bar snga 'gyur sdom rgyun mkhan brgyud
NK001(ka)037:75: kyi rnam thar dkyus bzhin shes par byas la //
NK001(ka)037:76: . nas d+harma sh+r+ai'i mkhan bu rab 'byams pa 'gyur med o rgyan chos grags ni /
NK001(ka)037:77: g.yo ru grwa phyin sku 'khrungs shing /
NK001(ka)037:78: gzhon nu nyid nas o rgyan smin grol gling gi
NK001(ka)037:79: chos grwar zhugs te yon tan thams cad kyi phyi
NK001(ka)037:80: mo yi ge 'bri klog nas brtsams rim par cho
NK001(ka)037:81: ga chos spyod blor 'dzin gdangs dbyangs phyag rgya rol
NK001(ka)037:82: mo dkyil 'khor bris thig gtor bzos mtshon pa'i phyag
NK001(ka)037:83: len che phra gang la'ng byang chub cing rang rkya
NK001(ka)037:84: pher ba bstan pa'i mig rgyan du gyur /
NK001(ka)037:85: mkhan chen rdo rje 'dzin pa lo chen chos dpal
NK001(ka)037:86: rgya mtsho gtsug gi nor bur bsten nas bstan pa'i
NK001(ka)037:87: gzhi ma 'dul ba so thar gyi sdom rgyun gsan
NK001(ka)037:88: cing / gzhi gsum gyi phyag len la sbyangs brtson phul du- phyin par mdzad /
NK001(ka)037:89: lhag par gter chen chos kyi rgyal po las snga
NK001(ka)037:90: 'gyur bka' gter chos sgo rab 'byams kyi smin grol
NK001(ka)037:91: rgyab brten gyi rim pa shin tu mang bar gsan
NK001(ka)037:92: / lo chen d+harma sh+r+ai las rgyud rgyal gsang ba
NK001(ka)037:93: snying po'i bshad khrid kho na'ng lo bcu gnyis kyi
NK001(ka)037:94: bar du lo rer tshar gnyis re gsan cing /
NK001(ka)037:95: . rjes chos grwa chen por lo mang du skyor
NK001(ka)037:96: dpon gyi khur bzhes te rgyud kyi bshad khrid man
NK001(ka)037:97: ngag mtha' dpyad dang bcas pa la gzhan dring mi
NK001(ka)037:98: 'jog pa'i mkhas pa chen por gyur te sngags rab
NK001(ka)037:99: 'byams pa'i mtshan snyan phyogs kun tu khyab /
NK001(ka)037:100: gzhan yang bka' gter du- ma'i sgrub pa phyag bzhes
NK001(ka)037:101: dang 'brel ba'i man ngag la rang byan tshud pas
NK001(ka)037:102: o rgyan smin grol gling gi bstan pa blar 'degs
NK001(ka)037:103: pa'i zhabs tog phul du phyin te gter chen sku
NK001(ka)037:104: mched kyi thugs zin sras kyi dwangs mar gyur to
NK001(ka)037:105: // de'i mkhan bu smin gling rdor 'dzin 'gyur med chos ldan ni /
NK001(ka)037:107: gzhon nu'i dus nas smin gling gi grwa sar zhugs
NK001(ka)037:108: te dpe cha 'bri klog dang tshogs 'don blor 'dzin
NK001(ka)037:109: gyis mtshon slob sbyong mang pos shes rab kyi sgo
NK001(ka)037:110: phyes / cung nar son nas thun mong rig gnas dang /
NK001(ka)037:111: thun mong gzhung lugs mang por gsan sbyong mdzad /
NK001(ka)037:112: .gung lo nyer gcig par mkhan po rab 'byams pa
NK001(ka)037:113: o rgyan chos grags las rang lugs 'dul ba'i sdom
NK001(ka)037:114: rgyun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsan cing /
NK001(ka)037:115: gzhi gsum gyi cho ga sogs mdo phyogs kyi bshad khrid lag len dang /
NK001(ka)037:116: khyad par sgyu 'phrul gsang snying sogs sngags rgyud kyi
NK001(ka)037:117: bshad pa la rtsal du bton pas sngags ram pa'i
NK001(ka)037:118: mtshan thogs shing bstan pa la mdzad rjes che /
NK001(ka)037:119: lhag par bod du bstan dgra sog po jun gar
NK001(ka)037:120: ba'i rgol ngan slebs te rang bstan la yo 'khyom
NK001(ka)037:121: ci rigs 'byung skabs gong gi sngags ram pa o
NK001(ka)037:122: rgyan chos grags dang 'di gnyis kyis smin gling gi
NK001(ka)037:123: bstan pa'i srog rtsa bzung bas na sku drin shin
NK001(ka)037:124: tu che'o // de'i mkhan bu o rgyan bstan 'dzin rdo rje ni /
NK001(ka)037:125: smyos gdung rgyal sras drin chen rin chen rnam rgyal gyi sras su sku bltams /
NK001(ka)037:126: sku gzhon nu nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma'i
NK001(ka)037:127: zhabs la bsten nas gsan bsam phyogs med du mdzad
NK001(ka)037:129: thun min gzhung lugs mtha' dag la sbyangs brtson phul du byung bas mkhas pa'i rtse mor son /
NK001(ka)037:130: .gung lo bco lnga par rab 'byams pa 'phel rgyas las dge tshul gyi sdom pa nos /
NK001(ka)037:131: .gung lo nyi shu par rab 'byam pa 'gyur med chos ldan las bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsan /
NK001(ka)037:132: 'dul ba'i brda chad dang phyag len la byang chub pas mkhas btsun bzang po'i khyu mchog tu gyur /
NK001(ka)037:133: khyad par yab rje drin chen rin chen rnam rgyal
NK001(ka)037:134: las mdo sgyu sems gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i bka'
NK001(ka)037:135: ma / bka' dgongs phur gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i
NK001(ka)037:136: gter ma'i phyogs mang po'i-smin grol man ngag rgyab brten
NK001(ka)037:138: rang don nyams bzhes dang gzhan don 'chad spel gyi phrin las shin tu rgya che zhing /
NK001(ka)037:139: lhag par o rgyan smin grol gling gi bstan pa
NK001(ka)037:140: bshad sgrub gnyis ldan gyi sgo nas bskyangs pas snga
NK001(ka)037:141: 'gyur ba spyi la bka' drin phul du byung ba
NK001(ka)037:142: yin no // de'i mkhan bu rgyal sras rig 'dzin bzang po ni /
NK001(ka)037:143: dpal ldan smyos kyi gdung brgyud du sku 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)037:144: sku gzhon nu'i dus dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma las gsan bsam rgya chen po mdzad /
NK001(ka)037:145: .gung lo nyer gcig par mkhan chen o rgyan bstan
NK001(ka)037:146: 'dzin rdo rje las rab tu byung ste bsnyen par
NK001(ka)037:147: rdzogs shing / gzhi gsum gyi phyag len sogs mdo phyogs la gsan sbyong zhib /
NK001(ka)037:148: khyad par rang lugs bka' gter rgya mtsho'i smin grol
NK001(ka)037:149: rgyab brten dang bcas pa bum pa gang byos su
NK001(ka)037:150: nos / o rgyan smin grol gling gi mkhan khri
NK001(ka)037:151: la bzhugs skabs mdo khams sde dge nas 'jam dbyangs
NK001(ka)037:152: mkhyen brtse'i dbang po dgung lo nyer gcig bzhes pa
NK001(ka)037:153: dbus phebs skabs mkhan chen rig 'dzin bzang po 'di
NK001(ka)037:154: nyid kyi gtsos dad pa'i dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i
NK001(ka)037:155: mdun nas bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa bzhes pa sogs
NK001(ka)037:156: bstan pa 'phel rgyas kyi son rtsa lta bur gyur
NK001(ka)037:157: te mkhas btsun bzang po'i mdzad pa phul du byung
NK001(ka)037:159: de'i mkhan bu mkhan chen pad+ma bkra shis ni /
NK001(ka)037:161: sku gzhon nu'i dus nas dam pa'i rigs sad de yon tan gsan sbyong la don gnyer che /
NK001(ka)037:162: ru dam bsam gtan chos gling du gzhung lugs rab 'byams la gsan bsam rgya chen po mdzad /
NK001(ka)037:163: .gung lo nyi shu par rgyal sras rig 'dzin bzang po las rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)037:164: mdo sngags rig gzhung dang bcas pa la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i mkhyen rab kyi rtsal rdzogs /
NK001(ka)037:165: mkhas btsun bzang po'i yon tan rmad du byung ba mnga' zhing /
NK001(ka)037:166: mdo khams rdzogs chen pa'i mkhan po'i khri la yun
NK001(ka)037:167: ring por bzhugs te bshad sgrub las gsum gyi sgo
NK001(ka)037:168: nas mdo sngags bstan pa'i phrin las rgya cher spel
NK001(ka)037:169: / sku tshe'i smad la yang dag spong ba pa'i
NK001(ka)037:170: brtul zhugs dang du bzhes te nges med dben pa'i
NK001(ka)037:171: gnas su tshe dang sgrub pa mnyam par mdzad do
NK001(ka)037:172: / // de'i mkhan bu thub bstan pad+ma- rgyas pa'i nyin byed rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas ni /
NK001(ka)037:173: mod khams rdza stod dge mang gi phyogs su sku 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)037:174: 'di nyid mkhan chen bo d+hi sat+wa dang lo chen
NK001(ka)037:175: bee ro tsa na zung 'jug gi rnam 'phrul du
NK001(ka)037:177: sku chung ngu'i dus nas yi ge 'bri klog sogs brda bstan pa tsam gyis mkhyen //
NK001(ka)037:178: ga pa chen po'i rigs sad cing mkhyen rab kyi rtsal kha shin tu che /
NK001(ka)037:179: rim par mi 'gyur nam makha'i rdo rje /
NK001(ka)037:181: rdo grub kun bzang gzhan phan sogs khams phyogs dang /
NK001(ka)037:184: rdo brag rig 'dzin chen po yab sras /
NK001(ka)037:185: lho brag lha lung gsung sprul yab sras sogs phul
NK001(ka)037:186: byung mkhas btsun grub pa'i rnam thar bsam mi khyab
NK001(ka)037:187: pa la mnga' dbang 'byor ba'i slob dpon dge ba'i
NK001(ka)037:188: bshes gnyen mang du bsten nas /
NK001(ka)037:190: thun min mdo sngags gzhung lugs /
NK001(ka)037:191: khyad par gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa mdo sgyu sems gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i bka' ma dang /
NK001(ka)037:192: bka' dgongs phur gsum gtso bor gyur ba'i gter ma'i
NK001(ka)037:193: phyogs rnams kyi dbang lung man ngag bshad khrid mtha'
NK001(ka)037:194: yas pa gsan cing brgyud 'dzin bka' babs lung thob
NK001(ka)037:196: bar skabs su stod gangs ri ti se nas smad
NK001(ka)037:197: rgya nag glang chen 'gying ri yan sgrub gnas khag
NK001(ka)037:198: tu gnas 'brel bsnyen sgrub la gzhol te grub pa'i
NK001(ka)037:199: sa mthor gshegs / tshangs spyod rnam dag gos dkar lcang lo'i cha lugs su bzhugs shing /
NK001(ka)037:200: nges med kyi gnas su sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan kho na 'dzug par dgongs bzhin yod na'ng /
NK001(ka)037:201: nyin gcig gi tshe na 'di ltar bstan pa spyi'i
NK001(ka)037:202: lam srol sngar chos rgyal chen pos bka' bcad pa
NK001(ka)037:205: nyams len pad+ma dang bi ma la'i lugs ltar byas
NK001(ka)037:206: na snga 'gyur ba'i bstan pa 'di nyid dus kyi
NK001(ka)037:207: mthar yang cung zhig mi nub dar rgyas su 'gyur
NK001(ka)037:208: nges snyam pa thugs la glo bur du 'khrungs pa
NK001(ka)037:209: ltar de kho na phyag bzhes su bstar rgyu'i thugs
NK001(ka)037:211: rdzogs chen mkhan rabs dang po pad+ma bkris las rab
NK001(ka)037:212: tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te 'dul ba'i gnang
NK001(ka)037:213: bkag la tshul bzhin bslab pas ngang gis nyes ltung
NK001(ka)037:214: phra mos kyang ma gos pa 'phags pa nye bar
NK001(ka)037:215: 'khor dang mtshungs par basngagasa 'os su gyur /
NK001(ka)037:216: rdo grub chen 'jigs med phrin las 'od zer gyis
NK001(ka)037:217: lung bstan pa ltar ru dam rdzogs chen dgon du
NK001(ka)037:218: phebs pa dang / rdzogs sprul mi 'gyur nam makha'i
NK001(ka)037:219: rdo rje'i zhal snga nas nyid rdzogs chen dgon du
NK001(ka)037:220: bzhugs nas bstan pa bshad sgrub kyi gzhung srong dgos
NK001(ka)037:221: pa'i bka' lung gnang ba ltar /
NK001(ka)037:222: mdo sngags bstan bcos kyi gzhung bshad ci rigs dang /
NK001(ka)037:223: rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro cog gi ljags lung /
NK001(ka)037:224: 'dul ba gzhi gsum gyi phyag bzhes bzang po'i rgyun
NK001(ka)037:225: bskyangs pas mdo khams phyogs kyi rnying phyogs rnams smos
NK001(ka)037:226: ci / grub mtha' gzhan gyi dgon sde sngar dbyar
NK001(ka)037:227: gnas sogs med pa rnams su'anga ngang gis khyab cing
NK001(ka)037:228: ci / / bka' 'gyur ro cog gi lung rgyun kyang je 'phel du gyur /
NK001(ka)037:229: lhag par snga 'gyur bka' ma'i chos sde mod sgyu
NK001(ka)037:230: sems gsum gyis gtsos pa'i rgyud lung man ngag sgrub
NK001(ka)037:231: phrin skor rnams bka'i bsdu ba gnang zhing 'phrul spar
NK001(ka)037:232: du bskrun te 'chad spel yang dang yang du gnas
NK001(ka)037:233: ba la brten nas da lta'i bar snga 'gyur gyi
NK001(ka)037:234: bstan pa rin po che mi nub dar zhing rgyas
NK001(ka)037:235: pa'i gsos su gyur pa ni dam pa'i thugs bskyed
NK001(ka)037:236: smon lam gyi mthu kho nar nges /
NK001(ka)037:237: mthar zhing barje khar kho bo ston pa mchog de'i
NK001(ka)037:238: brtul zhugs kyi rjes su slob pa'i rten 'di las
NK001(ka)037:239: ma 'gyur bar shi na rang don du 'gyod pa
NK001(ka)037:241: gzhan don du ni phyogs gang nas kyang bstan pa'i
NK001(ka)037:242: bya ba de'i 'phro mthud de brtson pa mi lhod
NK001(ka)037:243: pa smon lam gyi dbang gis 'ong zhes 'da' kha'i
NK001(ka)037:244: zhal chems stsal te zhing khams su gshegs so //
NK001(ka)037:245: de'i mkhan bu thub bstan rgyal mtshan ni /
NK001(ka)037:246: mod khams rdzogs chen gling sprul sku phreng rim byon gyi skyes bu dam pa'i go sar bzhugs /
NK001(ka)037:247: gzhon nu'i dus nas thun mong rig gnas /
NK001(ka)037:249: khyad par bka' gter zab don rgya mtsho'i man ngag
NK001(ka)037:250: yongs su rdzogs pa gzhan dring mi 'jog par gsan
NK001(ka)037:251: / lhag par rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas las
NK001(ka)037:252: 'dul ba so thar gyi sdom rgyun rang lugs zhi
NK001(ka)037:254: gnang bkag bslab pa'i tshul la phyag len shin tu gtsang /
NK001(ka)037:256: gzhan don 'chad spel sogs mdzad pa phrin las rgya che zhing /
NK001(ka)037:257: mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che mtha' dbus
NK001(ka)037:258: kun tu spel bar mdzad pa'i bka' drin bsam gyis
NK001(ka)037:260: de'i mkhan bu tshul khrims rdo rje ni /
NK001(ka)037:261: dpal ldan smyos rigs su sku bltams /
NK001(ka)037:262: gsan bsam rgya mtsho'i pha mthar son cing /
NK001(ka)037:263: .gung lo'i dus skabs dang bstun te mkhan chen thub
NK001(ka)037:264: bstan rgyal mtshan las bsnyen par rdzogs nas o rgyan
NK001(ka)037:265: smin grol gling gi mkhan khri la bzhugs /
NK001(ka)037:266: spyir mdo-}gas chos tshul rab 'byams 'chad spel sogs bstan pa la mdzad pa rgya che /
NK001(ka)037:267: lhag par dgon sde nang gi dge 'dun gsar bus
NK001(ka)037:268: mtshon khams bo. phyogs kun nas rang lugs sdom rgyun
NK001(ka)037:269: don du gnyer ba rnams la bslab nor gyi rgyun
NK001(ka)037:270: spel bar mdzad pas bstan pa mi nub yun du
NK001(ka)037:271: gnas pa'i btsas su gyur to //
NK001(ka)037:272: de'i mkhan bu 'gyur med ngag dbang nor bu ni /
NK001(ka)037:273: g.yo ru grwa'i phyogs su sku 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)037:274: gzhon nu'i dus nas smin grol gling gi grwa sar
NK001(ka)037:275: bzhugs te 'bri klog nas brtsams thun mong gi bca'
NK001(ka)037:276: sgrig slob gnyer cho ga chos spyod blor 'dzin gar
NK001(ka)037:277: thig dbyangs rol gtor bzo sogs kyis mtshon dgon sde'i
NK001(ka)037:278: phyag len che phra gang la'ng mkhas pa'i rtser son
NK001(ka)037:279: te bstan pa'i mig rgyan du gyur /
NK001(ka)037:280: thun mong ma yin pa'i- rig gzhung smin grol bskyed
NK001(ka)037:281: rdzogs zab gnad la thos bsam sgom gsum gyi rtsal
NK001(ka)037:282: rdzogs / lhag par mkhan chen tshul khrims rdo rje
NK001(ka)037:283: gtso bor gyur pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las
NK001(ka)037:284: sdom pa gsum gyi bdun rtsis thugs rgyun gtams /
NK001(ka)037:285: mdo sngags gnyis kyi gzhung dang bka' gter man ngag
NK001(ka)037:286: las khrigs kyi skor la mkhas pa'i phul du phyin
NK001(ka)037:287: / tshogs chen gyi byang 'dren bgrang bya bcu phrag lhag pa mdzad cing /
NK001(ka)037:288: . nas rdor 'dzin mkhan po'i go sar phebs te
NK001(ka)037:289: o rgyan smin grol gling gi 'dus sdes mtshon lnga
NK001(ka)037:290: 'gyur chos sde rnams su mdo sngags kyi phyag bzhes
NK001(ka)037:291: gtsang ma rang lugs ma nyams pa'i rgyun bskyangs par
NK001(ka)037:292: mdzad do // de'i mkhan bu gcung 'gyur med ngag dbang chos kyi grags pa ni /
NK001(ka)037:293: bee ro dngos snang smin gling gter chen mchog gi
NK001(ka)037:294: gdung rabs chos rgyun dang bcas pa mi nyams 'dzin
NK001(ka)037:295: spel gyi bka' babs gter ston rang rig rdo rje'i
NK001(ka)037:297: gzhon nu nyid nas khams dbus kyi bshes gnyen mang
NK001(ka)037:298: po tshul bzhin bsten nas smin grol man ngag rgya
NK001(ka)037:299: mtsho lta bu gsan bsam sgom gsum mdzad cing /
NK001(ka)037:300: .gung lo nyer gcig par rdor 'dzin mkhan chen ngag
NK001(ka)037:301: dbang nor bu las bsnyen par rdzogs te 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)037:302: kun spyod shin tu gtsang ma la rtag tu thugs
NK001(ka)037:303: gzhol / ji zhig na smin gling khri tshabs kyi
NK001(ka)037:304: mtshan gnas bzhes dgos byung ba la brten nas smin
NK001(ka)037:305: dgon ma lag dang bcas par gzigs bskyangs kyis snod
NK001(ka)037:306: bcud gang sar nyams pa sor chud mi nyams gong
NK001(ka)037:307: 'phel gyi 'dzin spras phul du byung bas bstan pa
NK001(ka)037:309: de'i mkhan bu ngag dbang chos kyi blo gros ni /
NK001(ka)037:310: zhwa de'u 'khrul zhig mdo sngags gling pa'i yang srid de ma thag pa ste /
NK001(ka)037:312: gzhon nu'i dus nas rab tu byung ba la dgyes
NK001(ka)037:313: shing dgung grangs son nas rdor 'dzin mkhan po ngag
NK001(ka)037:314: dbang nor bu'i mkhan bu smin gling gdung brgyud kyi
NK001(ka)037:315: gcung 'gyur med ngag dbang chos kyi grags pa las
NK001(ka)037:316: bsnyen par rdzogs / gzhan yang grub mtha' ris su
NK001(ka)037:317: ma chad pa'i yongs 'dzin du ma las mdo sngags
NK001(ka)037:318: smin grol rgyab brten dang bcas pa shin tu mang
NK001(ka)037:320: 'khor lo gsum gyi mdzad pa bzang po bstan pa'i lhag zhabs 'di la dper 'os pa mdzad /
NK001(ka)037:321: lhag par snga 'gyur zhi 'tsho'i 'dul ba'i sdom rgyun
NK001(ka)037:322: gyi srog rtsa 'dzin par mdzad pas na chos bka'
NK001(ka)037:323: drin gyi phul du phyin pa yin la /
NK001(ka)037:324: da dung zhabs pad bskal pa rgya mtshor brtan nas
NK001(ka)037:325: bstan pa'i sgron me yun ring du mdzad par snying
NK001(ka)037:326: nas smon no // yang yar 'brog stag lung byang
NK001(ka)037:327: gter gyi chos sde skyong ba rngog chos sku rdo
NK001(ka)037:328: rje'i rnam 'phrul kun bzang chos sku /
NK001(ka)037:329: de'i yang srid sku phreng gnyis pa thub bstan chos kyi nyi ma /
NK001(ka)037:330: sku phreng gsum pa bshad sgrub nyin byed phrin las bzang po'am /
NK001(ka)037:331: yongs grags su stag lung rtse sprul rin po cher
NK001(ka)037:332: grags pa 'di nyid spyir sku gzhon nu'i dus nas
NK001(ka)037:333: ma dgon thub bstan rdo rje brag tu sgrig zhugs
NK001(ka)037:334: thog rang khongs sku yon gyi rigs rnams gsan sbyong
NK001(ka)037:335: mthar thon cing / yongs 'dzin dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang du bsten pa las thun mong rig gzhung /
NK001(ka)037:336: thun min rgyud lung man ngag gi smin grol gsan bsam rgya che /
NK001(ka)037:337: lhag par rdor 'dzin 'gyur med ngag dbang nor bu'i
NK001(ka)037:338: mkhan bu smin gling gdung brgyud kyi gcen mkhan khri
NK001(ka)037:339: 'gyur med mkhyen brtse nor bu'i drung nas rang lugs
NK001(ka)037:340: zhi 'tsho'i sdom rgyun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa bzhes
NK001(ka)037:341: shing / gzhi gsum gyi phyag len shin tu zhib /
NK001(ka)037:342: rim bzhin rang gzhan dgon sde mang po'i dge 'dun
NK001(ka)037:343: sogs phyogs matha'i don gnyer can rnams la bsnyen par
NK001(ka)037:344: rdzogs pa'i bslab nor gyi dga' ston ci dgar stsal
NK001(ka)037:345: bas dpal ldan zhi ba 'tsho'i phrin las rgya cher
NK001(ka)037:346: spel ba'i thugs bskyed lhur bzhes pa'i ngang nas da
NK001(ka)037:347: lta 'tsho zhing gzhes bzhin pa 'di lags te /
NK001(ka)037:348: da dung bgrang bya brgya phrag brgal bar zhabs pad
NK001(ka)037:349: brtan cing mkhan slob gnyis kyi bstan pa'i sgron me
NK001(ka)037:350: yun ring du spor bar mdzad par snying nas smon
NK001(ka)037:351: no // yang sngar kahdama pa bde gshegs sogs nas
NK001(ka)037:352: bzung khyad par 'phags pa'i skyes chen rim par byon
NK001(ka)037:353: pa rnams kyi bka' drin la brten mdo khams bod
NK001(ka)037:354: chen po'i phyogs kyi snga 'gyur dgon gnas chos sde
NK001(ka)037:355: rnams su mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che
NK001(ka)037:356: spyi dang bye brag so thar gyi phyogs la rang
NK001(ka)037:357: lugs zhi 'tsho'i sdom rgyun ma nyams par gnas bzhin
NK001(ka)037:358: no // pa la / bar lam rgyal sras gzhan
NK001(ka)037:359: phan mtha' yas sogs kyi skabs nas brgyud pa'i bka'
NK001(ka)037:360: srol shin tu mang bar gyes pa'i rnam grangs mtha'
NK001(ka)037:361: yas pa ni 'dir bsdu zhing barjoda pa'i skabs ma
NK001(ka)037:362: no // pa la / rnyed mo. / da lta'i
NK001(ka)037:363: dus su mdo }gas bstan pa'i srog rtsa mi chad
NK001(ka)037:364: pa'i slad du 'khor lo gsum gyi phrin las spel
NK001(ka)037:365: ba la nam yang zhum pa med pa'i thugs bskyed
NK001(ka)037:366: can ni dpal yul rnam rgyal byang chub gling gi
NK001(ka)037:367: bstan pa'i mnga' bdag grub dbang pad+ma nor bu'i mchog
NK001(ka)037:368: sprul 'jigs med thub bstan bshad sgrub chos kyi sgra
NK001(ka)037:369: dbyangs dpal bzang po zhes bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen dam
NK001(ka)037:370: par 'tsho gzhes kyi skal bzang kun gyi mthun snang
NK001(ka)037:372: da dung yang sku tshe'i 'du byed 'tshi med rdo
NK001(ka)037:373: rje'i ngo bor bdag gir bzhes te mkhan slob chos
NK001(ka)037:374: gsum gyi bstan pa'i 'od stong nam mkha' ji srid
NK001(ka)037:375: du brdal bar gsol ba 'debs pa lags so //
NK001(ka)037:376: mtshungs med ston pa'i zhal skyin mkhan rabs phreng //
NK001(ka)037:377: ji ltar byon pa'i lo rgyus tam+bu ra //
NK001(ka)037:378: {la bzang rna bar 'jebs las yid ches kyis //
NK001(ka)037:379: nges shes 'dren pa'i pho nyar 'gyur la re //
NK001(ka)037:380: tshul 'di ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i bshes rnams las //
NK001(ka)037:381: rmongs blun pha jo bdag lta'i khur min kyang //
NK001(ka)037:382: dam pa'i rnam thar dbyings su yal dogs nas //
NK001(ka)037:383: gsung sgros yi ger bkod la nyes med snyam //
NK001(ka)037:384: 'on kyang nor ba mchis na rang gi skyon //
NK001(ka)037:385: lags phyir mkhas dbang tshogs kyis bzod bzhes gsol //
NK001(ka)037:386: don mthun dngos po'i tshul barjoda dge ba gang //
NK001(ka)037:387: bstan pa rin chen rgyas pa'i dpal du shog /
NK001(ka)037:388: rab mdzes chos gos gsum gyis lus brgyan cing //
NK001(ka)037:389: legs gsung sde snod gsum gyis ngag rab brgyan //
NK001(ka)037:390: khyad nor bslab pa gsum gyis sems brgyan te //
NK001(ka)037:391: srid na zla bral 'phags pa'i sa thob shog /
NK001(ka)037:392: ces snga 'gyur sdom rgyun mkhan brgyud kyi rnam thar
NK001(ka)037:393: nyung gsal sgron me'i kha skong nges shes 'dren pa'i
NK001(ka)037:395: bskal ngan dus kyi rlung dmar ches cher 'tshubs pa'i
NK001(ka)037:396: skabs 'dir bstan pa'i sgron me bzang po yun du
NK001(ka)037:397: mi mnal ba'i cha rkyen kho nar dmigs te /
NK001(ka)037:398: snga 'gyur bka' ma'i chos sde yongs rdzogs kyi bka'i
NK001(ka)037:399: bsdu ba lhur len pa'i skabs thog ma'i gzhi rtsa
NK001(ka)037:400: mdo phyogs 'dul ba'i yig cha so thar sdom rgyun
NK001(ka)037:401: mkhan brgyud kyi rnam thar lo chen d+harma sh+r+ai'i gsung
NK001(ka)037:402: gi kha skong du da lta'i bar gyi mkhan rabs
NK001(ka)037:403: kyi lo rgyus sa bon tsam med du mi rung
NK001(ka)037:404: bar mthong nas / rang gi 'dren pa bshes gnyen
NK001(ka)037:405: dam pa rnams kyi gsung sgros la sgro skur gyis
NK001(ka)037:406: ma bslad par mdor bsdus snying por dril ba'i tshul
NK001(ka)037:408: lha rigs sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen 'jigs bral ye shes rdo rjes sbyar ba las //
NK001(ka)037:409: ga ma'i yi ge pa ni shar phyogs mon gyi dge bsnyen kun bzang dbang 'dus so //
NK001(ka)037:410: 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nyams gong nas go nga du 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur cig /
